content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were returning home from a family gathering when i noticed a bright star in the south west sky just west of manhattan in nyc. our perspective of this event was from knolls crescent in the spuyten duyvil section of the bronx in nyc. i pointed the star out to my girlfriend stating "wow look how bright that star is" she agreed. i then told my girlfriend that the object was "too bright to be just a star" and that it was "probably a planet". suddenly, the object flashed and grew to an enormous white light (aproximately 10x its original size), then the light just vanished and we both saw a small object moving from the sight where the light had been due west before vanishing into the night sky.
content.summary: Stationary very bright star flashes; becomes huge star, then becomes a small object moving west across sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking in the same area of sky that i filmed my easter ufo sighting and noticed a commercial jet leaving a contrail. when the plane passed directly overhead i noticed a large barbell-shaped object stationary in the sky. i noticed the object become smaller and then back to its original size. then, it slid or glided- from a stationary postion about 1/3 the sky's distance- like on water- and back to its original position. this object was much higher than the haze at high altitude and much higher than air traffic. it was enormous! i could see the object's shading and it appeared to be white. i ran inside after a few minutes, grabbed my video camera and asked my girlfriend to come outside. she saw the object but could not focus on it. i filmed it but the ufo was much too high for my video camera to distinguish and it looks like a white blurry dot in the sky. it may still be there because the thin high clouds covered the object. i am going to keep an eye out.
content.summary: Massive barbell ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was on the front porch and saw a blue and white light for about 2 seconds and then dissapear.  i did not see it again.  it appeared to be moving but there was no aircraft or helicopter sounds.  i tried to plot in my mind where it may have gone and searched the sky for about 10 minutes but i did not see it reappear.  i thought it may have gone over a cloud. the sky was pretty clear and you could see many stars.  this is why i was looking up , to see the stars. i easily noticed the object because it was so out of place, blue and white and the biggest object in the sky. at first, i thought it was a helicopter turning on a searchlight, but it did not shine down or anywhere, it was just in one spot, glowing. the object seemed to be moving slowly foreward with a blue and white light,i think blue surrounded by white. what in the heck was that? am i seeing things, going nuts or what? i figured that i should report it to see if anyone else saw it and to help with your research.  i lost the object because it did not appear anymore.
content.summary: Blue and white light.

content.detailedDescription:
When exiting my office in st. peters, mo, i observed a bright red glowing light approximately 2 miles south of me at 20 degrees above the horizon. i heard no sound of a piston or turbine engine and no beating of rotor blades.

its apparent altitude was approximately 2,000 feet - 3,000 feet agl and appeared to be traveling 100kts - 150kts in a southwesterly direction.

it was more like a large red flare, a fireball, not a red light.  at first glance, i thought it might be a meteoric fireball; however, its speed was far too slow and there was no trail of light behind it.  it was just a slow, low flying bright red fireball, bright like a flare, but traveling level more miles.

i watched it for about 30 seconds when a very small white light seemed to drop from it approximately 3 miles away. the white object was very small in relationship to the red fireball, perhaps 1/100 the diameter, almost a pinpoint of light. it dropped vertically and soon disappeared behind trees and buildings between me and the object.

about 5 seconds after the white light dropped from the red fireball, the red object went from a large, bright red fireball to a somewhat dim, small red light and continued flying southwest until i lost sight of it.

i entered my car and drove south on missouri highway 94 to attempt to reacquire the object.  at highway 40/64, i proceeded west to missouri highway dd and then proceeded south.  approximately 10 miles south of my original position, i though i spotted the object approximately 20 - 25 miles southwest, but was unable to verify it was the same object before losing sight of it and giving up the chase.

as a former military fighter/reconnaissance pilot, i'm comfortable in saying this was not a fixed wing aircraft, was very unlikely a helicopter because of the relative size and brightness of the red fireball and lack of sound.

after arriving at home about 20 minutes later, i tuned in to cable channels to see if any reports had made national news. interestingly, the non-local cable channels were out. i spoke to a charter communications representative who said charter had received over 250,000 reports of cable outages in the area during the past hour.
content.summary: Large red fireball-like craft releases small white object over northwest st. louis suburb

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving my apt for work as a security officer and saw briefly what i thought was a small airplane.  it looked funny or different so i watched it and realized pretty quickly that it didn't look like a small plane at all.  there were no wings, no tail section, no windows, no lettering and it seemed not really to flying but alomost suspended or floating.  it just didn't move like a normal plane.
our maintenence man was working at the entrance of the complex and i pointed to the direction of the thing and said, "hey...Check it out!  what the hell is that thing?"  he turned and looked in the wrong direction and as i was trying to get him to reposition and look at it, it passed in the direction of the naval weapons station just behind some trees.
i pulled out and got around the corner to see if i could still see it but from the inside of my car i couldn't.
i called the emergency dispatcher in our area and asked her to see if the goose creek rural fire dept had seen anything strange (they were doing some sort of training in the food lion parking lot right around the corner from where i saw it).
i kept looking all the way across the cooper river to see if it was still there but it was gone.
the shape was cigar, the color was bright white, no lights that i could see and the other thing that strikes me as a bit strange is that it was so close to the naval "weapon" station.
content.summary: It looked like a plane at first with no wings and no tail secion, no windows or lettering

content.detailedDescription:
I was staying up late watching tv when i heard birds outside my apartment complex making a lot of noise. i only hear this and awake to this type of activity during the morning since i live on a second story of an apartment complex and the tops of the trees meet my window. yes, it's bothersome, but also it alerts me if something is going on when the birds get quiet or start making a noise in the middle of the night. needless to say, i don't need a guard dog.

once i hear the birds, i got up, thinking that squirrels were into a nest or something along the lines of them intruding. i feed squirrels, so i thought i would step outside thinking that they might need a midnight snack.

looking around, i did not see anything thing of the sort, so i went down to check the cars and surrounding area, as well as get some fresh air. i noticed nothing going on and decided to gaze around up at the sky.

once i did, i saw a huge, approximately 200-300 yrd black chevron shaped or you can call it a boomerang shaped object in the sky. it was totally silent and traveling, my best guess, and about 60 miles per hour.

i knew i was going to see this again. i saw something similar in the mid 80's when i was in grade school and well as in 2001 when i was back visiting family from the navy. the 80's sighting along with the 2001 sighting was all around the general vicinity that i am reporting now.

the past two sightings i decided not to report, but have been searching continuously to see if anyone else has. i have not been able to come up with it. i believe though i have not made enough effort, only checking the internet which surprisingly does not yield to much information. my next step is to go to the library to see if any reports via newspaper microfische will conjure up something.

back to the story, i decided, not to run and get my camera, but to gather as much information visual that i could and to take in the moment and try to embed as much in my brain as possible. 

the chevron object was silent. it was traveling about 60 mph, my guess is based up relationship to a private propped airplane, like a cessna.

it was moving and then stopped, hovered for about 15 seconds, rotated about 45 degress / or changed direction, and then started moving again at the same speed.

it had no lights and was totally black. the only reason that i know its shape was that it was against clouds that were back-lit by the local city lights. i looked in the saturday papers to see if anything was reported but did not see anything.

this is my 3rd sighting of this exact same ufo, and not heard of any other reports. i need some help if anyone else out there has seen this or experienced something similar. i feel like i am going to see this again and i do not know why.

eventually, it headed north of the columbia river which i am next to and went out of sight
content.summary: Black chevron that was silent, moving slowly, no lights, and turning in a controlled manner

content.detailedDescription:
Recently i was looking back at some old pictures from a recent climbing trip, i noticed two pictures that struck my eye when it cames to things in the sky.  the first picture is right before sunset, my girlfriend and a buddy of mine were sitting on top of sam's throne and i was was just snapping photos and the second is lets say about five minutes after the first photo was taken, i have looked at these photos and cannot conclude what they are, mostly i am interested to see what others might think.  the second photo seems to shoe a bullet/disc thing which i thought could be a plane's trail, but none of the other photos which are taken from the same seated position show the same trail appearing.  we did not see or notice anything while up on this rock outcropping and it is my guess that teh things in the pictures, especially number 2 just zipped by and i happened to catch it.  
the photos were taken on a sony cyber-shot dsc-p200 digital camera with 7.2 megapixels at sam's throne natural area near mt. judea, ar

photo 1 - upside-down bowl looking thing

photo 2 - bullet/disc object several minutes after photo 1

photo 3 - enlarged photo 2 for more detail
content.summary: Spotted somthing when looking at pictures

content.detailedDescription: Attached word file (includes 2007 sighting and 3 others)
content.summary: Larger light with smaller lights flying around it (at night).

content.detailedDescription: I sat on my step waiting for my girlfriend to get home, and about 3 hawks wereflyin. one was at a distance another with it, and the third seemded to fly right above my home. i see hawks but not often and not 3 at a time so these birds kept my attention in the sky. i watched them glide for about 15-20 minutes and then once i veered my eyes away to see where the bird above my home was going i noticed a small little dot. along with the many planes that were flying, this clearly wasn't a plane, it was far too small, and way above the altitude most planes i see flying. it did nothing strange, just the slow drift across the sky. at first i said well that can't be anything more than a piece of cloud, but then as it drifted under the cloud it became dark, as if the clouds cast a shadow. i immediately called my friend who claimed to have seen an ufo and described what i was seeing, and then the now dark object disappeared into the clouds. i was amazed to see for myself what i always here about and couldn't take my eyes from the sky with hopes to see this again so i could show my girlfriend. i definitely need a camcorder and a telescope now!
content.summary: Looked lik a small white dot, or as desribed like a diamond or star-like

content.detailedDescription: I will start with one that scared me. i was driving alone up into the mountains of bountiful,utah. the city sits at the foot of a chain of mountains called the wasatch. they are well traveled and there are many trails and camping spots throughout. i was going up to meet friends at a camping spot 2/3 of the way up the mountain. as i stated there is alot of traffic, so i thought nothing of lights following me up the road. i was driving a small car,so when i saw lights gaining on me i pulled over as it is a dirt road with narrow spaces and very steep drop offs,and there are many four wheel drives and bikes and four wheelers up there doing thier thing. so back to the location, i was at a point called dead man's curve by locals, (with good reason as several people have died by going over the edge).The dirt road makes a u shaped curve with at least a 1000 foot drop.It is not straght down but it is very steep. being in a small car i pulled over to let the big truck following me pass. it did not. it disappeared. it was probably about 100 yards behind me and as i have said, there is nowhere but down to pull over! i got out of my car to see if that was actually what happened!I heard and saw nothing unusual. because of the brush,(scrub oak ) it was difficult to see down the drop, so i walked down the road away from my car. that is when it get's weird! off to my right i heard something upslope from me (meaning up the mountain above me in the brush) what comes to mind (obviously is a deer or squirrel or a bird, etc.). but then i noticed about four shapes moving in the brush , i thought hmm people hiking, maybe the people in the dissapearing truck? i then noticed i could not focus on them,when i looked straight at them i could see nothing! when i defocused my eyes and looked out of the corner of my eye i could see shapes,bi pedal, nothing more.Then i saw a flash, but it was strange just under,the visual spectrum, before,invisibility,but detectable. i then was scared this was not normal! i saw them working their way down the hill towards me ,as well as heard them working their way towards me so like any half sensible fool i decided to get the hell out of there!I beelined towards my car, at that point i heard a high pitched whine,and i started jogging! i made it to my car it started thank god and i took off! i had to drive up to a turn around point about 400 yards further up the road, or keep going up the mountain about a 1/4 of a mile before i could turn around again. i decided at that point i did not want to be alone anymore so i decided i would chance a dead run back the way i came! while driving (dangerously fast for the terrain) i looked in the rearview mirror and saw not truck lights but several lights well placed enough for me to know it was  not  a truck following me but an airborne craft of some kind! much bigger than a truck but smaller than say, a kenworth, it was somewhat round but misshapen i can see it in my mind but i did not focus on details as i was trying to get the hell away from it! it then dissappeared again! i reached the turnaround, and stopped,trying to decide what the hell i was going to do! being on that point in the mountain i could go up? or go down back to civilization and maybe some help? that clinched it! i decided to go back to where i came from! at that point the craft (yes i could see it clearly it was a craft, popped up from the drop off that many people have died on, at that point i was done with the whole situation and i punched it back down the mountain, lights following me the whole way just untill i reached the houses again. i don't know where it went nor do i care, i feel i am one lucky s.O.B.! i have other stories as well, one of which is verifiable by others.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I like camping, i have had several sightings  in different locals. two of which scared me terribly.

content.detailedDescription:
I was the manager on duty that weekend and i awoke to use the restroom.
on my way back to bed from the bathroom i noticed bright lights shining through the split in the window curtains. i thought it might be the police with their lights on, so i opened the curtains and to my amazement it wasn't  
the police. it was several bright multi-colored lights in the sky in the shape of a circle just hovering oh about a few hundred feet above the ground. then after several minutes (8 or 10 minutes) a bluish beam of light came from the center of the other lights and hit the ground about a hundred feet from my window. it was illuminating what seemed to be a dog in the parking lot.
then after about 30 seconds the beam of light just cut off. it was too dark to see if the dog had left, but when the beam of light shined on the dog it did not run away as i had expected it to. it seemed to be frozen in it's tracks. this seemed strange at first but then i remembered that a deer will freeze in it's tracks when in the headlights of a car. then after the beam cut off the rest of the lights seemed to begin spinning clockwise and elevating slowly about another hundred feet or so, then they shot into the night sky at an alarming rate of speed. i could not even guess how fast. but faster than anything i have ever seen before. faster than a drag racer. and at an angle of about 45% until they just vanished or went out of range      of my sight. i know this sounds hard to believe, but i saw what i saw and i have never have seen anything like this before. i just wish i had my camera with me because nobody would have believed me if i told anyone, so i kept it to myself and my wife. 
thank-you for this opportunity to get this off my chest. i have been wanting to tell this account to someone other than my wife, who still does not believe it.
content.summary: Multi-colored orb-shaped large bright lights w/ blue beam shining on ground

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling s.Ih-35 near mcneil rd. on my way to work at u.S. postal facility. i noticed a bright object approximately 30 meters to my right and parallel to my window. i did not think; i just observed the object and still have no idea, what it was. the object was a bright, approximately 12-16" in diameter. i first noticed a downward motion and then an object traveling parallel(eye level/same speed) to my truck for several miles. after the fact, i reviewed the incident; comparing it to a meteor:color,speed,trails,motions. the object then moved slowly down and to the right behind a tree line.
content.summary: Traveling s ih-35 when object appeared on my right side of vehicle.

content.detailedDescription: It was the summer time. i was camping with a friend and his family at a camp site on lake allatoona.  we had gone to bed one night.  my friend and i were sleeping in a small tent with the top off so you could see through at the sky and trees above.  his sisters, mom and his mom's boyfriend were in a pop-up camper.  sometimes that night which i'm not sure exactly what time it was i woke up.  as soon as i did i was looking straight up at the sky through the tent.   i saw a large circular orb of light just above the tree line.  it was just hovering.  after looking at it i was pretty frightened. i turned to look at my friend and he was already awake and i asked him if he was seeing what i was seeing.  he replied yes.  i took one last look, it was still hovering then we both got out of the tent and went into the camper as fast as we could.  we were both very scared.  my immediate thought was that it was definitely some kind of ufo.  after having many years of reflecting my friend and i still don't understand what we saw.  if i had been alone i would have just forget as some strange dream or something of my own imagination but my friend saw the same and can't explain it either.  i have no idea what it was that night and i can't come up with any explanation.  i want to be able to think that it was of this world but my mind has not been able to convince itself yet.
content.summary: Large light hovering above the treeline

content.detailedDescription:
On 05/20/2008 at around 1900hrs i was dispatched to the area of hwy 59 south near oak colony on a shots fired call.  the complainant advised there had been several shots coming from the creek behind the subdivision.   my zone partner and i responded and checked the location and found nothing out of the ordinary.  

after the checking the area my zone partner and i met at coletto baptist church which is located at the entrance of oak colony subdivision.  my zone partner and i talked while standing outside of our patrol cars.  just after sunset, while still at the same location, we noticed a bright sphere in the southern sky.  the night sky was clear so the sphere was easily observed.  the sphere appeared to be a single ball of light but did not appear to be emitting light.  the sphere was moving north and appeared to be following hwy 59 which runs north to south.  we watched as the sphere moved north and i commented that the sphere was very bright to be so high in the sky.  i believed the sphere was traveling at a high altitude because it appeared to be moving slowly.  

as the sphere came closer to us we realized the sphere was traveling at a low altitude and at a low rate of speed.  my zone partner and i agreed that the sphere was approximately 2,000 feet above ground level.  my zone partner was the first to comment that the sphere was making no sound.  we both felt this was unusual because of its close proximity to the ground.  as the sphere crossed over where we were standing, i noticed there were no side marker (wing) lights or tail lights on the sphere.  it appeared there was no other type of structure around the sphere of light itself.  once again we felt it was strange that we did not hear any sound coming from the sphere.

we watched at the sphere continued to travel north.  from our point of view, when the sphere was in the area of loop 77 it appeared to zig-zag to the right and then back to the left.  the sphere did this at least twice.  we lost sight of the sphere when it neared the city of victoria.  in my estimate we tracked the sphere for approximately 5-7 minutes.  

in my opinion, the sphere was no fixed wing or rotary aircraft that i have ever seen.  i feel that a normal fixed wing or rotary craft would have produced sound at the altitude it appeared to be flying.  also, there was no marking lights located in the proximity of the lighted sphere.  

it should be noted that within two hours of observing the sphere, there were two power outages on opposite ends of the county of victoria.  i observed one of the power outages.  the outage i observed was strange in how it occurred.  i was driving on sigfried st. in the city of victoria.  there was a very bright flash in the sky directly behind my patrol car.  instantly after the flash, power was lost in a large area of the city and also in parts of the county of victoria.  there was not a sound of an explosion after the ���flash��� in the sky.  usually it is consistent to hear an explosion and a flash after an electrical transformer blows.
content.summary: I observed a sphere like object moving across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work in atascadero, california traveling south on el camino real blvd when i noticed something in the sky that my mind could not comprehend.  i had never seen anything like this before.  it was a uniformly gray colored metallic object very high up in the sky that had seemed to materialize out of a cloud.  it did not appear to be moving.  as i looked at the object i tried to figure out what it was and found i could not.  it was not an airplane or helicopter since it was not moving or shaped like them.  it was obviously not a balloon; it was not floating and it was definitely made out of some metallic-like substance.  and the object was too high in the sky for it to be attached to a telephone pole. after about 20 to 30 seconds the object emitted a bright white/yellow light and appeared to disappear into the clouds. the light could have been sunlight reflecting off the object as it moved back into the clouds or it could have been emitted by the object itself; the object was too far away for me to be completely sure.  i watched the sky for another five minutes or so to see if the object would emerge from the clouds but i did not see it again.
content.summary: A metallic object appeared right outside of a cloud, hovered motionlessly for about 30 seconds, flashed a bright light, and disappeared into the cloud

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were on our way home from picking up his work check  on the 15th of may 2008 and i looked out of the window and saw a large passenger plane slowing down as if getting ready to land then i noticed an object behind it.I then started to really look and get a clear view,this object was about a hundred feet behind it,directly behind it.I noticed that it was an unusual shape for a plane and i realized it wasn't a plane.The top hade a pink colored dome in the middle and the botton looked dirty gray and didn't reflect the sun the way the plane did.It kept its didtance and stated behind it the entire minute that i saw it.It then went out of sight and it was behind trees and at that time we lost it.The plane appeared to be going in for a landing at the portland airport.It appeared to be over a thousand feet from the ground.My brother turned several times to look at it but he was driving and couldn't look at it the way that i could.I would be willing to take a lie detecter test.So would my brother.Thank you for your time.Jane
content.summary: We and my brother were traveling east on s.E. halsey saw space craft to our left.It was traveling west.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking on boynton beach, florida around 9:30pm with my girlfriend. we walked there frequently in the evenings. there was a public parking area at boynton beach. a few people were around. the area was well lit, but a little darker on the beach itself. we liked to walk and talk and look at the surf and sky. we were not under the influence of anything.
 i noticed what i thought was a satellite moving across the sky. if you have ever seen a satellite at night it glints with reflected sunlight and describes a precise orbital line across the sky. i was sure it was a man made orbital satellite.
 i pointed it out to my girlfriend and told her it was a satellite in orbit. as we were both looking at it, it suddenly darted off at about 3 acute angles and vanished. it initially appeared to be moving as a satellite would across the sky, to the northwest. it appeared to be that size, no brighter than the stars. then it darted off and made about three acute turns, at an unbelievable speed, and vanished out of sight. if this object was at orbital height, like a typical man made satellite, when it darted off, it must have been travelling at many thousands of miles an hour. this speed, as it appeared to us, defied the laws of physics.
 we were astonished, and couldn't explain this sighting as a bug, airplane, jet or anything but a ufo. i don't think this sighting was more than 10 or 20 seconds.

 this happened around 1981. this is to the best of my recollection. i have never forgotten it, and my nephews and neices have suffered through the story dozens of times!
content.summary: We saw what initially looked like a satellite shoot off at acute angles.

content.detailedDescription:
I don't believe in all of the hype of ufo's and frankley i can't stand to hear about sightings and see horrible pictures. but, about a year ago i was outside and looked over in the field, a plane seemed to have come down from the sky very quickly, so i thought. i started to freeze up thinking that it was going to crash not far from my home. then like nothing at all it slowed down to turtle speed and stayed above the fields for a minute and disappeared, i mean literally disappeared. if it was a plane or whatever and flew back up, then it was way too fast for the eye to see.

while it was over the fields, it appeared to be oval or round in shape and it was fairly bright. honestly i froze in shock more or less, trying very hard to convince myself that it was a plane. 

i tried to tell my family about it, but couldn't find the words and i didn't want to sound crazy. i am a very level headed wife and mother, so i kept this to myself all this time. i don't why i decided to let it out here, i just know that it was eating me up inside and i had to get it out.
content.summary: Very definate that it was not from here.

content.detailedDescription:
Every morning at almost the same time i would go outside on my deck because i let the dogs outside in their penned areaas i start my coffee at around 5:45am. i would often just stand outside and look at the dark sky and the stars. of course it usually looks pretty much the same. this one morning-i caught myself staring because there were two really bright spots of what looked like bright white light that i never noticed before.
i remember thinking that it would be strange that these two 'stars' would appear in a spot and be so darn bright that i wouldnt have noticed them moving to that position over the days weeks or days. they kind of looked like a part of the big dipper but brighter. and i thought-that cant be because its never at that location-the dipper is way to my right and behind me-not directly in front-at least it never was yet.
so if i were to give it an eyes distence it would have been four inches appox that the lights were spaced apart.

          o                                 o

as i watched, they moved at the same time at a steady speed, so that they were out of my field of vision in about 8 seconds. they did not strobe or flash-the light remained constant and they moved together in a straight due north direction.
i was so caught up in the intensity of the moment i couldnt move. it was almost as though there was no sound at all.

i looked around for any mention of anything someone might have reported in the sky and didnt see anything....I didnt want to tell too many people because i was concerned about my reputation. i know what i saw was no star-no plane-no blimp-no flare. but i dont know what is was. i am not sure of the exact date-but i moved in feb and it was not around the holidays, so i am thinking the middle or end of january.
content.summary: There were two very bright lights - that to the eye looked inches apart

content.detailedDescription:
I was gone from the home and returned around 9:15 pm on june 22, 2008.  my daughter was still up, i was going to scold her for being awake.  she told me she saw something outside my window.  she got alerted by a light coming in the window.  she looked out and maybe 5 car lengths away about and  maybe 200 feet above the ground she saw this round object, hovering, it was silver in color, with little rounded curve on top.  she had drawn a picture of it.  i went out, put my glasses on  and looked and what i saw first were three what looked like us fighter jets going overhead.  then in the distance i could see flashing red and white lights, looked like stars but shot through the sky.  then i would see more what i think were us jets (they were triangular in shape)  this went on from june 22nd, 2008 at approx. 9 pm - june 23rd, 2008 at approx. 12:15 am.  i stood outside and watched this from 9:45 until midnight.   there was this like fog in the sky that was like settling.  i was so tired, i went to bed at that time and looked out my window before going to sleep and another jet went by.  we are not near any military base.  then my daughter was dressing for school this morning.  she looked out her window and told me there was a man out there with a box, holding it up writing stuff down.  i went and looked, it was a yellow box (i looked on internet as to what geiger counters look like and that is what it appeared to be) he would hold it above his head, it had some kind of stick on it, he would look at it, then write it down, (it wasn't a lap top, it was just a screen where you could write into it, it didn't have keys)  he went to different areas doing this.  he was in a truck i have never heard of before.  

this morning i woke up not feeling well.  funny taste in my mouth, sore throat, really bad headache and my skin feels like it is burning.
content.summary: Daughter went to the window because she saw a bright light coming, there she saw a disc shaped object in sky

content.detailedDescription:
The weather was nice so all the bedroom windows were open.  it was april or may.  it was before we had the air conditioner on.

i was in bed alone awake and thinking about getting up to read or watch tv since i was not falling asleep.  then heard what i though was a helicopter right over our house.  it seemed to be staying in one place - then the sound changed.  it got quieter but i knew it was still there.  then another sound - an oscillating humming sound which had a steady increase in power.  i thought that if a sound could actually pull you physically up - this sound could do that.  i also wondered if our military was experimenting with the affects of sound.

later - i do not know how much later - i was in kind of a fetal position on the bed.  i was thinking that i can not move because if i moved it would know that i was there.  i remember thinking that i was doing a good job of staying still because i even stopped blinking.

i have never had such an experience and never felt anything strange in my room other than when my grandmother died and i felt that she visited me to tell me that she was ok.  i later reasoned that was due to my extreme grief (i was 16 at the time).

i only bother with that to say this is only the second "strange" experience that i have had and i am 62 years old.

i was so sure that something happened that night, that i placed our digital camera and my mini tape recorder on the nightstand.  they remained there for a good year after the event.  i was determined to record proof the next time but there was no next time.

it was months before i told my husband about this and i only told him because he wondered where the camera was. it did not cross my mind - until my husband suggested it - that perhaps i could not move and i just thought i was in control.  he just reminded me (i just read this write up to him) that i also asked for a bigger/brighter flashlight for the backyard.

i know about one feeling like they cannot move while awakening from a dream - not news to me.  i have a degree in psychology and have read on that subject.  

for some reason i think about this event enough to wonder what the big deal is since it did not happen again and ok maybe it was just a dream.
content.summary: Strange sound and could not move

content.detailedDescription:
Over the past few nights, i have noticed the same flashing light in the sky.  the object would flash all different colors, every color imaginable.  after watching over a period of time, there were noticeable flashes coming off the object, as though something were breaking off in flames.  the flashes began to look more and more like pulses, as though the flashes were copies of the object, in different colors.

this particular night, i went out to my car to get a pack of cigarettes, and noticed the object in the sky.  i returned to the house and told my friends of the event outside, and they came out and witnessed the same flashing object.

after watching it for approximately a half hour tonight, the object became dim, and then vanished altogether.  we looked in every direction, but the object was gone.
content.summary: Bright flashing light in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
On may 14, 2008 at 20:40. whitney portal ca. @ 8,000 ft elev. i happened to look east over the owens valley at just above the inyo mt skyline. (finger width) i noticed two stationary orange blinking lights that alternated on and off for about 1 second. they were the  size of an "o" (at arms length)  the distance between the lights was the width of an "o".
by the time i thought this to be a strange sight and i should get the camera the lights stopped. five to eight seconds later single orange light of the same size blinked on for a second about 2 inches south of the original sighting.  i watched for 5 mins and nothing after that.  the lights were not moving when they were on.  i looked at my watch and it was 8:40 pm. 

the attached photo is a view of the skyline where the lights were sighted.

lights were in left of the dead tree and in the v notch in the mountain.

the single light that was sighted was on the right side of the dead tree and a little higher than the original two lights.

this photo was of the sunrise with cloud cover. in my sighting the sky was clear.
content.summary: Two orange alt blinking lights above inyo mts east of lone pine ca.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a 31 year-old white, college-educated, male.  i am a professional photographer from st. louis, missouri.  

at the exact time of the sighting, i was sitting in the backyard of my cousin's home located off cortaro farms rd., nw of tucson off of highway 10 around 1 am.  during this time, my cousin's husband, a white-male in his mid-forties, was seated next to me as we conversed, relaxing, and gazing at the clear night sky.  as far as i am aware, we were the only people outside in the vicinity or for that matter aware of the craft that we observed for an hour. 

seated on the back patio, looking up and towards the distant nw sky, i noticed a small, spherical shaped object at about 45 degrees.  the object was completely stationary and didn't move as far as i could tell for the entire sighting.  

i noticed it because i had been enjoying looking at the open, dark desert sky for a while that evening.  i was on vacation, i grew up in the mid-west and rarely leave the city anymore, taking the time to leisurely gaze at a night sky that is unavailable where i live.  i noticed the object because, after a while, i kept coming back to it over and over again while scanning the sky.

the object, from my vantage point and to the naked eye, was small and spherical-shaped.  it seemed like a very large, star in the night sky.  it's primary characteristic was that the distant object was emitting an intense, multicolored light.  the light, seemingly bursting out of the object, was consistent in it's multicolored strobe-like effect; it seemed that the orgin of the colored strobe was not a single lens, bulb, panel, or led, but many bulbs or lenses on the sphere pulsating different colors of light simultaneously like a transparent disco ball with an internal light source.  because of the intensity and brightness of the light, the craft may have been another shape besides spherical; with the properites of light and physics, the light i observed was eminating from obvioulsy a source and source of light in darkness descibes only the shape of the source, not the shape of the object that possesses the source.  there was no way to ultimately tell the shape but it seemed spherical.

the presence of the stationary object in the clear, arizona night sky started to really bother me.  this was way to big to be a star i thought.  way too bright and multi-colored to be a star.  it wasn't moving.  it could have been mistaken for a star at a passing glance, but after a short while looking around and comparing the object to other stars, planes, and helicopters in the night sky, it stood out more and more.  i grew up near a small airport and knew this wasn't air traffic simply because of the light coming from it and it's absolute stationary positioning.  this was something i had never seen or heard of in my life.

i pointed out the object to my cousin's husband, a native arizonian and outdoorsman, and asked him if he could identify it.  he could not.

we intently stared at the light for twenty minutes.  we absolutely could not explain what we were witnessing or liken it to any object or experience that we have ever had.  our awareness of the light in the sky after about twenty minutes became extremely unsettling.  similtaneously our reaction to the presence of the object was that of intense curiosity and caution.   

my cousin's husband rose from his lawn chair next to me, walked into his house, turned out all of the interior and exterior lights of the home and property, and came back in a few minutes carrying a telescope and tripod. 

we walked over to a nearby picnic table in the backyard and set up the telescope on top of it.  

i manned the telescope first.  once i located the object in the telescope's viewfinder and focused the lens on the pulsating light, i clearly saw the object close-up.  

the object's purpose, positioned in the night sky, seemed more like that of an unmanned probe than a transport craft.  it just sat there in the sky bursting with different, small strobes of color.  there was no way to tell the ultimate size of the object because of it's distance.  the object had to be at least located 10 miles away from nw of our position. 

my cousin's husband and i took turns viewing the object with the telescope for another 30 minutes.  we referred to it at the time of our extended sighting as a u.F.O..

during this time, i became quite alarmed from observing the object. 

i felt like the crushing weight of a newfound reality had been dropped on our mood and our psyches.  i felt like certainly what i was witnessing delivered unsolicited implications that would directly effect myself and the entire world in the near future.  fueled by adrenaline, an agonizing reappraisal of my awareness and existence in life raged in my mind.  during the event and reflecting back on it, i can only conclude my reaction was the process of an instinctive human survival technique that occurs when one is faced with situations that must be instantly digested and mentally processed.  

the object remained in the night sky.  dealing with his own inner turmoil, my cousin's husband went inside to bed, leaving me outside alone.  i stayed outside looking at the object for another 15 minutes.  i was a guest, it was getting late, i had to go to bed, the next day was an early one.  going inside to bed, leaving the u.F.O. in the sky behind me was really hard.  the next evening the object was not visible.  


note;

this experience has stayed with me.  too many questions unanswered.  what made me make this report now is that not only did i see recent footage of the exact same object a few months ago on the show ufo hunters on television captured in ohio near lake erie, but more importantly, last night my relative outside of tucson witnessed another sighting of the same, exact craft in the night sky but this time there were 5 of the spherical, pulsating multi-colored lights in a loose circular formation.
content.summary: Two adult males observe a distant, stationary craft/probe object emitting intense multicolored light for an hour with a telescope outside of tucson.

content.detailedDescription:
A white carious disk shape object was in one of the frames of the weather cam when i attempted to monitor local cams for the out of control brush fire in santa cruz mountains today.  the resolution is very low on this web cam and i cant make certain what i am looking at.  it could be a . itpieace of cloud that just happened to be disc shape.


on a very clear day...No clouds in the sky a sudden brush fire grows out of control in santa cruz mountains, about 80 miles south of san francisco.  as reported, it started approximately at 5:15 am. in a matter of few hours it engulfed over 2000 acres of the mountain ridges. as an astro-photographer, i often check the weather around for possible observing night.  however, with just a couple days past the full moon phase, i was more carious about my friends living locally in santa cruz mountains this time.  so i monitored the news channels until afternoon when i left home.  later in the afternoon, i started checking local news and online webcams for actually seeing how far the fire had progressed.  in one of the captured frames of one particluar web cam i noticed an unusual looking object in the blue and coudless sky.  it was white as cloud would be so it could very well be just "cloud". however, being such a perfect disc shape looking, i thought to publicize it, just in case it wasn't some weird looking clouds. in case, others had seen simliar thing.  i saved the image from the online site and refreshed the frame.  it was not there anymore. unfortunately, i didn't refresh immediately to illuminate the cloud possiblities.  i was distracted before i noticed any thing on that frame and it wasn't until about half an hour later that i finally noticed and refreshed to get a new frame.  i guess, i would not think of it as a big deal, unless there are other similar local reports.
the resolution is very low so it is not very possible to magnify much to see any structures.  however, when magnefied, there is a carious shade on just one side (top-left half) which could also be the ccd artifactof the web cam.  but, i would expect to see it symetrycally on the opposite side if that was the case. so...It is open for further investigation and possible other sightings...Below is the link to the live cam site.

http://www.Heartmath.Com/view.Html

note: the first image with time/date stamp of 16:55 was noticed at about 17:30 (5:30pm). the second image was not the immediate image i saw after this one, but some time later.  however, the object was not there after about 30 minutes. i did not save that frame as i didn't think it mattered since it was so much time already passed.
content.summary: A white disc shape object  caught in the weather web cam.

content.detailedDescription: I take this photo in serra da gardunha with cellphone
content.summary: Photo

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside from my house and i was going to ask my mom a question and i looked up at the sky because i like to look up at the stars. it was a bright clear night and there were alot of stars in the sky. the minute i looked up i happen to see a bright light shoot across the sky.My dad was standing by me and i yelled, "look a shooting star." as i was yelling that, i saw many of them bright star-like lights move in all different directions. some were going side by side, others were going in a group of three right next to each other,i also saw some going in a line of two right behind one another. some were going in zig-zag form really fast. i just kept watching them as they passed through the sky.... i couldn't believe how many there were. most of them were headed to the north coming from the south.I looked down for a minute at my dad and said, "what is that?" those can't be shooting stars.There not airplanes. he said should i go get my video camera? i said, yeah. as he stepped inside, i continued to look up, i saw so many of them still going fast through the sky.I was shocked and thinking to myself what is happening in the sky.I then ran in the house and yelled look their still alot flying through the sky as my dad was getting his video camera set up.We both walked back outside and looked up and it slowed down, all we saw then were 2 star-like lights in the sky going north. we tried zooming in on them, but his camera couldn't pick up anything that far away into the sky.I continued to look up and there was nothing, but the bright stars out on this cool night.It went on for about an hour.
content.summary: I witnessed alot of star-like objects going in zig-zag patterns going north from the south

content.detailedDescription:
I  was standing in my backyard late morning, i happened to look up toward the west and there were 4 separate objects that at first appeared to be parachuters, but  this  was in the  air traffic path here in grand junction, we are used to seeing many types of aircraft as grand junctional regional  airport is also a military  depot.
i watched these objects  spin in  small circles, they were ���floating���  and every time they would turn i would see a  quick flash of red and then white, super bright.   i could not estimate the distance.  after a few minutes they floated straight up and  stretched out into a straight line ( from north to south)  2 red now appearing to be bright stars facing south , and 2 white facing north  disappearing westward.  
 my best description  of these objects is parachuters, but this doesn���t seem probable since they were not decending.  i have 10 years navy experience, and have seen  many aircraft, but nothing like this.
content.summary: Unexplained formation midday in flight path grand junction airport

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling north on i 35 in lewisville with my granddaughter when i glanced up to my left and i noticed a cylinder metallic silver object. i knew it was no plane the instant i saw it. it had no wings, lights or anything else on it that i could see.  it had three vertical markings on it, just lines of some sort. there was an airplane in the fore ground between me and the object.  the airplane was traveling in the same direction as the object but the object was moving much faster.  it just glided in the sky for about 30 seconds and i was trying to see it while driving.  i looked at the road and back and it was gone. at that my graddaught asked me what that was in the sky and i asked her if she was talking about the airplane and she told me no and that she was talking about the "other thing".  i told her i did not know.  i got chill bumps when she asked me that.
content.summary: Metallic silver, no wings, moving very fast over i35 in lewisville, tx

content.detailedDescription:
I have previously emailed this account to dr. eric kubik and will meet with him and anyone else to deliver a 25 photo series of ufo taken the same week, same location.

in august 2005 i was in my backyard walking toward the salt marsh at dusk.  i looked out over the ocean (l.I. sound) and saw lights in the distance that appeared to be a ufo.  strange as it sounds, the shape defined by those white lights was not what i would have imagined a flying saucer to look like.  it appeared like the tall vehicle that was depicted in the "et" movie which i thought was ridiculous at the time that the movie was made.  i turned and continued to approach the marsh and heard a brief low pitched hum behind me.  as i entered the marsh of tall reeds, i was shocked to find that the craft had instantly appeared directly overhead no more than 100 feet in the air (i used to be medical crew on a medical helicopter) and was absolutely huge. i was terrified thinking that it had spotted me and i crouched and hid in the wet reeds.  it now looked to be a solid craft, almost like a vast floating city, similar in scope to views from under the starship enterprise.  there was a window with vague figures inside and some sort of searchlight which scanned the marsh.  eventually i sensed that it was not looking for me but rather for beings awaiting pickup.  i did see shadowy images of figures around me in the marsh and i sensed a feeling of calm as they pointed out the overhead ship in a kind of proud or reverent manner.  there was no verbal or telepathic communication.  i witnessed them being picked up methodically as if ascending an invisible staircase.  another interesting point:  i had a flashlight in my pocket and i felt a definite magnetic tug on it, but not strong enough to pull it away from me.  what is weird is that the distant lights had approached me incredibly rapidly, yet once overhead, this huge craft moved imperceptibly slowly and rook a full hour to pass over and fade away.  i will never forget this and would be willing to undergo hypnosis to provide more physical detail of the structure.

i have taken video of lights across the marsh  (about 1/4 mile away) which seem to be security lights on buildings along route 1.  they behave strangely as they will suddenly zoom right up to the camera and then recede repeatedly.  when up close, they do odd things and the perimeter resembles the sun's corona and even look like holes or openings like portals at times.  they also prohect a narrow blue beam down into the marsh.  i have learned that my grandmother witnessed an apparent crash into this marsh in approx october 1980, but did not report it.  are you aware of any sighjtings in clinton(westbrook line) at that time?  some residents have a vague memory of something.

i have a 25 photo series taken the same week...Intricate light structures in the sky in formation;  they change spatial relationship to each other, sometimes cast relections onto clouds and accompanied by a white ball of light.  i have others also and would be very interested to have them seen by your organization and/or subjected to analysis.  

i am sane, honest and worked 32 years in patient care in hospitals.  i've always had an open mind to the idea of extraterrestrial life, but never witnessed anything until this.  i am age 55.  i believe that i've stumbled onto something and that it is very important.  thank you.
content.summary: Distant lights instantly appeared directly overhead and remained as solid appearing enormous object (ship)
